title: Offerings of the Leaders
summary: Numbers 7 records the offerings brought by the leaders of each tribe for the dedication of the tabernacle. Though repetitive, it emphasizes each tribe’s equal contribution to God’s work.

faq.question: What did each tribe bring?
faq.answer: Identical offerings including silver, gold, animals, and grain.

faq.question: Why is this chapter so detailed?
faq.answer: To show the generosity and unity of all the tribes in worship and dedication.
